name: ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Check correct documentation is being utilized
INSPECTION/TEST METHOD: Current revision of drawing
CONFORMANCE RECORD: Current revision of drawing
1.2 - Ensure Safety, Traffic, Quality & Environmental management measures are in place
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencement of activity.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Safety plan, traffic management plan and environmental management plan
INSPECTION/TEST METHOD: Ensure all measures in place as per plan
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Confirmation of stockpile location approved by superintendent.
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: FH Scope document, EMP
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Any existence of underground services to be located and proven
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Works to be reviewed and agreed by Superintendent
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Hold Point release for Commencement of Works Letter
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Letter to be signed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Environmental controls installed and maintained as per EMP
2 - Site Access / Rock Fill / Wingwall Repairs
FREQUENCY: Prior to excavation of toe
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Dewatering and earth bund to be confirmed on site
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Trees for removal marked out and approved for removal
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: Environmental Management plan, DEECA permit
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Adequate benching and site access track constructed
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Suitable Type A Fill material used for placement behind upstream wingwall
FREQUENCY: Prior to wingwall form and rock placement
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Geotextile layer placed under rock beaching and behind wingwall
FREQUENCY: During the placement of the toe rock
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Solid base, Maximum particle sizes 750-1000mm
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Flowable grout adequately placed to fill void under downstream wingwall
FREQUENCY: At the completion of works
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Stockpiles and temporary works are removed.
○ Minor defects are agreed with client

This is to verify that the final inspection has been carried out in accordance with the Fulton Hogan’s Quality Procedures and Project Quality Strategy and the product is hereby certified to conform with the contract specifications:
